General.Name: I-Sheng Electric Wire & Cable Co Ltd
General.Description: I-Sheng Electric Wire & Cable Co., Ltd. provides plugs and connectors, power supply cords, LAN cables, and electronic signal cables in Taiwan and internationally. It also offers photovoltaic wires; power strips and night light products; hook up wires, coaxial cables, telephone wires, computer cables, and computer peripheral cables; oxygen index materials; thermal stability cables and Congo red materials; and injection, non-migration, matte, weather and oil resistant, modified and elastic, and abrasive materials. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.50, Dinghu Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 333
